## Setup

### Using PyPI

```bash
  pip install geoletrld #TODO
```

### Manual Setup

```bash
git clone https://github.com/cri98li/Geolet-reloaded
cd Geolet-reloaded
pip install -e .
```

Dependencies are listed in `requirements.txt`.
